name: Ash of War: Dryleaf Whirlwind
description: It is a brand-new Ash of War in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. An ash of war that allows the user to perform a powerful whirlwind attack.
short_description: An ash of war that allows the user to perform a powerful whirlwind attack.

data.skill: Dryleaf Whirlwind: This skill represents the pinnacle of Dane's footwork-based martial artistry. Rise into the air with a series of spinning kicks before crashing down with one final strike. Imbues kicking attacks with energy, increasing their range.

name: Ash of War: aspects of the crucible: wings
description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Sacred affinity and the following skill: Aspects of the Crucible (Wings).
short_description: This Ash of War grants the skill: Aspects of the Crucible (Wings).

data.skill: Aspects of the Crucible (Wings): This skill originates from the lifeforms of the Crucible. Grow a golden pair of wings and take to the air before diving down at the foe, weapon first. A spinning attack is performed when wielding a twinblade.

name: Ash of War: Spinning Gravity Thrust
description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Heavy affinity and the following skill: Spinning Gravity Thrust.
short_description: This Ash of War grants the skill: Spinning Gravity Thrust.

data.skill: Spinning Gravity Thrust: A gravity skill honed by the disciples of an Alabaster Lord. Uses gravitational power to hang in the air before rotating the body and charging forward. An additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

name: Ash of War: Palm Blast
description: This Ash of War grants no affinity to an armament, but imparts the following skill: Palm Blast.
short_description: This Ash of War grants the skill: Palm Blast.

data.skill: Palm Blast: Skill of the spiritual seekers known as the Dryleaf Sect. Imbues hand with energy before using a palm strike to unleash an explosive blast. The already formidable power and impact can be bolstered by charging the attack.

name: Ash of War: Piercing Throw
description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill: Piercing Throw.
short_description: This Ash of War grants the skill: Piercing Throw.

data.skill: Piercing Throw: Throw armament with a powerful spin, causing it to bore through foes. When using this skill, the armament can be thrown further than normal and also pierce through enemies.

name: Ash of War: Scattershot Throw
description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill: Scattershot Throw.
short_description: This Ash of War grants the skill: Scattershot Throw.

data.skill: Scattershot Throw: Employ smithing arts to conjure multiple copies of the armament in both hands and throw them all at once. Follow up with an additional input to throw again.

name: Ash of War: Raging Beast
description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill: Raging Beast.
short_description: This Ash of War grants the skill: Raging Beast.

data.skill: Raging Beast: Step with the swiftness of a beast, leap high, and slash foe from above. Initial step can be taken forward, backward, left, or right. Strong attack allows for a follow-up attack.

name: Ash of War: Savage Claws
description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill: Savage Claws.
short_description: This Ash of War grants the skill: Savage Claws.

data.skill: Savage Claws: Pounce like a beast to viciously slash into foe with left and right claws.

name: Ash of War: Swift Slash
description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill: Swift Slash.
short_description: This Ash of War grants the skill: Swift Slash.

data.skill: Swift Slash: A skill passed down amongst hornsent swordsmen. Take a swift forward step to slice through foes. This sharp strike also fires off a shearing vacuum. Can be charged to increase the skill's power and the distance of the forward step.

name: Ash of War: Overhead Stance
description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill: Overhead Stance.
short_description: This Ash of War grants the skill: Overhead Stance.

data.skill: Overhead Stance: A skill that starts with the blade held high in a ready stance. Execute a normal attack from this stance to step forward and slash downwards, or a strong attack to deliver a series of downward slashes.
